CustomField.description:
Primary: Clones existing Contract and Subscriptions without connecting the new Contract to a existing one.
Delivery: Used for municipality deals or deals where multiple schools will have access to the purchased subscriptions. Deep clone of contract and subscriptions. Connects the cloned contract to an primary contract.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Primary: Clones existing Contract and Subscriptions without connecting the new Contract to a existing one.
Delivery: Deep clone for municipality deals or deals where multiple schools will have access to purchased subscriptions on a common order.
CustomField.label: Contract Type
